descriptionHtml:
This is my fist mod. I am trying to fix a problem I have with Skyrim.
Even though now all zombies are infinite, with dead thrall they will almost be immortal, as their healing rate will be much faster.
I also recommend these two mods to go with this one :
-http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9726//? - Necromancy 101
-http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36158//? - Undead FX
Requirements : 
Skyrim and latest update.
                                                                                                Thank you for reading this, 
                                                                                                                  GingoBiloba
author: GingoBiloba
